name: Careden
description:
This game was made by 3 people:

Plundration - Code

NonRidiculousAdjective - Art

Andres Boissiere - (great) Music and SFX

https://andresboissiere.wixsite.com/abmusic/sound-design

NonRidiculousAdjective and Plundration (official team of Quasar Game Studios) also work on their own bigger projects, so check out our channel!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCajlIhxlG1J_VotX1HH9l4g?view_as=subscriber

Note

Game is finished in general, but as you can see we didn't have time to add an icon nor set the fullscreen as default (but you can size it up as any other window to fit your screen), which we plan to do after the jam ends, we also have one sprite for a plant that we will add later. (if you have any suggestions for the game, post them in the comments below)
